title: Greg Miller Hearts Ty Root - Gregway Episode 24
description:
Ty Root is handsome. Greg is not. Somehow, they love each other.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Leave your questions for Greg in the comments and check back every Wednesday and Friday to see what he's saying.

Subscribe to Greg's channel: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Our Merch Store is live: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

The Vlog playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVv1g9oZi6O95CwRHQd0ulT6

Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/user/GameOverGreggy

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody Welcome to Gregway every Wednesday and Friday I take one of your questions from YouTube comments or Twitter and turn them into these here videos that you hopefully like subscribe to the channel and then share with your friends today's question comes from Ty Root he says "you and me" he wants me to talk about let me tell you about Ty Root okay first off you know Ty Root formerly of IGN now of SuperKnockout fame um I did not like Ty Root one bit when I first met this guy all right cuz I show up at IGN I'm one of the one of the fat kids I'm with the other fat kids or whatever and then there's this like goddamn Adonis over here with his hair slick back and his his chiseled everything and he's doing push-ups and stuff but like here's where it's not even just based on visuals that I didn't like for Ty Root I didn't like Ty Root because me and him were going down like my first month there first few weeks going down to Activision to see one of the Spider-Man

based on visuals that I didn't like for Ty Root, I didn't like Ty Root because me and him were going down like my first month there, first few weeks going down to Activision to see one of the Spider-Man games I want to say it would have been Spider-Man 3 and it was me, him, Doug Perry another former IGN editor and I got to the airport before Doug did and I worked with Doug closely and I met Ty Root obviously around the office once or twice, I get to the airport, I sit down in the chair at the terminal directly across from Ty Root, we make eye contact, I give him the nod and he just goes back down to whatever he's doing and I'm like **** you man like what's your problem and then Doug showed up sat down and TW was all like oh hey Doug and Doug's like hey did you see Greg and he's like oh no I didn't see him I'm like **** liar Ty Root, you look right at me in the eyes gave you the head nod, I know you're a good-looking dude but you're not just getting random head nods in the SFO Pro but you know over the

him I'm like a liar Ty you look right at me in the eyes gave you the head nod I know you're a good-looking dude but you're not just getting random head nods in the SFO Pro but you know over the years Ty grew on me like a fungus of course fungus probably grows on him after he goes to the gym or whatever turns out he's a good guy dedicated guy works out too much drinks too much Muscle Milk gives terrible advice on SuperKnockin Boots podcast which you can subscribe to and buy at GameOverGreggy.com KnockinBoots but Ty's a great guy I like him a lot I love him now but that first impression man Go **** Yourself Ty so that's another Gregway in the books remember if you want me to make more of these you need to leave questions in the comments below or hit me up on Twitter until then GRE hit the Gregway with your segue and ride on down to the Bay
